tool_description: Creates structured recording scripts for voice talent with pronunciation guides, timing cues, and quality control instructions.

transcription_data.description: IPA transcriptions and words for script generation

recording_format.description: Audio format specification: single_word, phrase_context, or both

pace_guidelines.description: Speaking pace: slow, normal, or fast

include_phonetic_guide.description: Include IPA guide in script for talent reference

error_messages: Mismatched data lengths: transcription_data and word_entries must have equal length.
Invalid repetition count: Must be between 1 and 5.
Session too long: Estimated session time exceeds duration limit.
Empty transcription data: Provide at least one transcription entry.
usage: Provide transcription data, word entries, and recording format. Configure voice instructions, pace, repetitions, and timing parameters. Returns structured recording script with cues and instructions.

timing_estimates.description: Estimated recording time for each section in seconds

break_markers.description: Positions and types of suggested breaks

total_estimated_time.description: Total estimated session time in minutes
